title: Your main Called you for help
body: What does she/he wants from you?

replies.body:
{{champion:50}} 

I don't want anything from you. This is just a routine call to remind you that Noxus will not tolerate insubordination.
Are you meeting your weekly demacian kills counts? You better not be slacking!
{{champion:69}} Wants me to tell her why her E doesn't do extra damage on champions no matter what since everyone in league is already toxic.
This made me laugh

{{champion:13}} 
He's reminding me to stay out of his way.

you need to hide the scroll
{{champion:13}} "Take this scroll and stick it.. somewhere safe!"
Me: pls no

{{champion:45}} He can't reach the top shelf.

He then realizes the height implications.
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/9c/Remove_Scurvy.png/revision/latest?cb=20150707190028&format=webp

{{champion:82}} "Fetch me a Beer, and some Nachos!"
Me: "Sigh... Whatever oh Lord of Death."
{{champion:82}} *stares maliciously*
Me: "On it Sir of Suffering, Paladin of Pain, Master of Metal and the most vile of Iron revenants!"
Mmm. "Sire of Suffering" would have had a better ring to it. We would have also accepted "Malicious Master of Metal" or "Wicked Bad Voodoo Man".

{{champion:82}} SUMMONER!
{{summoner:31}} (sighs) What is it Morde?
{{champion:82}} I need you to fetch me something, also if you were anyone else, I'd kill you for not addressing me properly.
{{summoner:31}} With all due respect, SIR, I've carried a coffin containing your bones out of a city attacked by a dragon halfling, prior to which I had to break you out of a Noxian jail because you just had to insult the favored pet of the leader of the damned nation right to his face! There isn't much you have to prove to me, Morde I've seen your best and worst moments, so this whole respect thing is kind of moot.
{{champion:82}} You sound like you're my wife.
{{summoner:31}}  Didn't you have like, several wives when you were still alive?
{{champion:82}} I can neither confirm nor deny this.
{{summoner:31}} Whatever, what is it you want?
{{champion:82}} (throws a broken electric guitar at my feet) I need a new guitar.
{{summoner:31}} I JUST _BOUGHT_ THAT FOR YOU LAST WEEK; TO REPLACE THE ONE YOU BROKE THE **PREVIOUS** WEEK!
{{champion:82}} When you metal, you metal heavy. And sometimes shit breaks. (waves me off) New guitar, please.
{{summoner:31}} (kicks the remains of the old guitar and grumbles off, trips suddenly) Dammit! (continues off, now cursing)
 {{champion:82}} (chuckles at having used Siphon of Destruction to make me stumble and trip) Did he think I'd let him get away with such disrespect?

{{champion:202}} Would you mind helping me with my art?
Me-{{summoner:12}} Oh hell no.

{{champion:75}} "I need stacks"

Me: *throws a cockroach on the ground in front of him*

{{champion:75}} ...?

Me: "The world is full them. Stack as many as you need. We both win here."

{{champion:150}} 
http://img.pandawhale.com/post-29143-english-motherfucker-do-you-sp-ENnD.gif
{{champion:203}} Lamb wants to watch a comedy to understand emotion. Wolf just wants to eat my popcorn. All of it. {{item:3070}}

{{champion:122}} Hey, geek! This'll be a long game. Bring some lunch to the post-game lobby, would you?
{{champion:107}} Make a fire. I've brought **dinner**.
{{champion:44}} Could you groom my hair? It's _such_ a mess...
{{champion:81}} Help me fix my  ~~makeup~~  warpaint! I need to make a good impression on Sir Garen, I'm hanging out with Lux-**ahem**-Lady Luxanna in an hour!
{{champion:2}} I've got blood in my beard. I... I need help cleaning and tying it up again. (I'm Norwegian, vikings have a history of braiding their hair and beards.)
{{champion:82}} Someone stuck a note to my back. I. Cant. Reach It.
{{champion:4}} How'bout dinner at midnight and a game o'cards? (I'm a girl, dont worry homophobes/loremongers)
{{champion:266}} You are the only one that appreciates my work... (Are you drinking again? Im sure somebody'll pick you again soon!)

{{champion:23}} 
Wants help strengthening his left arm.

{{champion:35}} you se-

Me: yes I have an extra shovel, just return it when your done

I was going to something along those lines, but every true Shaco main knows two things:

1- If there is one person that needs no help to hide a body is Shaco
2- He'd never hide body, he would probably drop it in front of the police station with his signature just to make people mad.

{{champion:31}} Is hungry.

Obviously, I am running as fast as I can. {{summoner:6}}

{{champion:131}} : Help me make more Lunaris!

Me : o_O
{{champion:107}} When is riot releasing the next marksman? I want more! I AM HUNGRY

{{champion:21}} "Help me kill GP's Men or else"
Me: "Yes Ma'am"
{{champion:37}} "Help me get my DJ equipment moved and we can play video games afterwards"
Me: "Sweet"
{{champion:254}} "Hey Punching Bag"
Me: "Shit"

{{champion:103}}
I've been waiting for this day for years....( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Bard got a meep stuck in the toaster.

And he wants help looking for chimes.
{{champion:37}}  needed a victim,she called asap to calm down her sadistic thirst.

{{champion:62}}: I got my tail stuck in a door again ;__;

http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/BlueMoonWolf_zpsqbl79kbj.png : Damn it Wu, not again. How does this keep happening?

{{champion:62}} : Doors aren't made for monkeys >.>

http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/BlueMoonWolf_zpsqbl79kbj.png : I don't see OTHER champs with tails have this problem

*other line rings*

http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/BlueMoonWolf_zpsqbl79kbj.png : hold on Wu I'll be right there. *switches lines* hello?

{{champion:150}} : SHUBA WABA MATA  BANA T_T (my tail is stuck in a door)

http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/BlueMoonWolf_zpsqbl79kbj.png : OH COME ON!

{{champion:103}} do these shorts make my butt look fat?
Me : I'm not answering that
{{champion:103}} Aw common please I need to know
Me: Fine... No they doesn't.
{{champion:103}} ...
Me: What?
{{champion:103}} Nothing... *stomps off*
Me: ...
my soul
Thresh?
Veigar maybe?
{{champion:17}} ?

{{champion:133}} Demacia needs hero's

Me: Yah about that (Runs to piltover as fast as I can).

{{champion:133}} Valor to me

Me: (Runs faster)

{{champion:133}} whee airplane
Me: (I then precede to get caught and dragged to a demacian prison run by {{champion:86}} )

{{champion:24}} 

He wants me to get him a real weapon.

{{champion:432}} 
http://i.imgur.com/gpiNc0z.gif[/img]

{{champion:122}}  needs help beating demacia
{{champion:412}} needs help beating lucian with his wifes soul
{{champion:80}} WHERE DID THE FLOUR GO AND WHY ISN'T THE OVEN BEING PREHEATED?

{{champion:268}}  : Shurima!!!
Me: Yes Emperor?

{{champion:268}} : Sand Soldier Go!
Me: Wait a minute... I'm not a... oooo {{summoner:4}}

{{champion:266}} 

Me: Oh hey Aatrox how's the endlessly war goi-

{{champion:266}} I'm SO upset, NOBODY understands me! They'd rather compliment {{champion:202}}! 

Me: Hey man, just calm down, what happened?

{{champion:266}} M-My MASTERPIECE! They called my work a HACKJOB! ;_;

Me: There there, I'm sure they were just jealous. 

{{champion:266}} Y-you're probably right. After all, I was an artist here before he was! This will be no mere massacre; this is my masterwork!"

Me: .... (after realizing he's off to kill a lot of people)
{{champion:157}} : Turn on the AC..
{{champion:55}} Wants to prove to me that violins solve everything
{{champion:429}} just wants to talk about her people problems

{{champion:37}}: *sits and smiles*
Me: Your aware that talking about bad teammates over tea only works if you can speak
{{champion:37}}: {{item:3070}} 
Me: Crap... did it again. *hugs to make her feel better
{{champion:121}} To consume me and evolve. I'll proceed to lock myself in my room and hope that he finds something else to eat.

{{champion:78}} 
She wants me to help her find the hero.

RING RING

Hello?

{{champion:80}} Bait

Again? last time i almost died tho

{{champion:80}} BAIT BAIT

Ugh Fiiiiiiine

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

{{champion:42}} "I got a bogey on my tail!"
"Again? That's 10 times already!" [Takes out the fighters] "There. Now watch your back next time."
Attention. {{champion:119}}

{{champion:122}} Fetch me something to eat,this is gonna be a bloody battle!
{{summoner:31}} I can help if...
{{champion:122}} Then i just get to dunk less.
{{summoner:31}} Alright.Medium rare steak,some beer and some spaghetti?
{{champion:122}} No spaghetti.It's not moms so.
